metadata.name: Windows Share Mount Via Net.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects when a share is mounted using the "net.exe" utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net1.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('net\.exe', 'net1\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' use ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\'))))

output.summary: Detects when a share is mounted using the "net.exe" utility

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate activity by administrators and scripts Reference: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lKya3_mLnR3UQuCoiYruO3qgu052_iS_/view
